availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David H. S. Jones (Hopkins County, KY, farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Jones. Father of Mary A. Jones, Martha H. Jones, William Jones, David W. Jones, John B. Jones, James H. Jones, Nancy C. Jones, and Elizabeth E. Jones. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 73A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 1, p. 687.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 605.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994039, Hopkins County Deaths.
